name: Photo Finish Control Mattifying Face Primer with Salicylic Acid
about: What it is:An oil-fighting primer with a matte finish to defend your skin and perfect your makeup..Finish:Matte.Highlighted Ingredients:- Silkscreen Complex (Antioxidants, Hyaluronic Acid, Probiotic Extract, Vitamins, and Algae): Nourishes, visibly balances, and defends skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Infused with nourishing, protective, and visibly balancing Silkscreen Complex, this primer forms a breathable, silky barrier that visibly perfects your skin, smoothing and defending against damage from environmental aggressors like pollution and blue light.
ingredients: -Silkscreen Complex (Antioxidants, Hyaluronic Acid, Probiotic Extract, Vitamins, and Algae): Nourishes, visibly balances, and defends skin. .-Witch Hazel, Salicylic Acid, and Zinc: Mop up oil. ..Water/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Methyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Calcium Carbonate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Algae Extract, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Lycium Chinense Fruit Extract, Rosa Hybrid Flower Extract, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Yeast Extract/Faex/Extrait De Levure, Pantethine, Caffeine, Butyl Avocadate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaine, Trehalose, Sorbitol, Zinc PCA, Glycerin, Sodium Polyaspartate, Polyglyceryl-3 Disiloxane Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Isopropyl Isostearate, PPG-15 Stearyl Ether, Lauryl Methacrylate/Glycol Dimethacrylate Crosspolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Polysorbate 80, Disodium EDTA, Silica, Hydroxyapatite, BHT, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tocopherol, Benzoic Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Smooth over clean skin..-Wear alone or under makeup.

reviews.review_text: I typically don‚Äôt use primers, because they make me breakout. I‚Äôve had this issue with the regular smash box photo finish primer as well as a slew of other name brand primers. Unfortunately I suffer with adult acne. I would say it‚Äôs usually 1-5 blemishes and not more severe. However after using a primer or foundation for a night I instantly break out the next day. I try to use face makeup with acne fighting medications. However it can be difficult to find quality makeup containing such ingredients. I saw this product while browsing at my local Sephora store. I noticed it had salicylic acid in it. However I cannot find the percentage of this ingredient on the package. A Google search said it has 2% salicylic acid, but I can‚Äôt confirm that. I can confirm that this product does not cause me to break out and appears to be helping improve my acne versus making it worse. So while this product is advertised as a shine control primer I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs also an acne control primer. I definitely recommend especially for acne prone skin.

reviews.review_text: Love this product! It does exactly what it needs to do. My makeup looks great after a day of working which is all that I look for. Recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin has been really oily recently and just powder has not been cutting it! This primer perfectly mattifies your face without making your skin look cakey! Great product definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start by saying this primer truly is mattifying. It‚Äôs a thick formula that mattifies your skin to prep it for foundation. I have oily skin and my foundation comes off after a few hours. With this primer it stays in place all day. It‚Äôs has become my go-to primer! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a disclaimer, I received this product complimentary from Influenster and Smashbox.   I must admit, I have never been a fan of Smashbox primers because I felt they did not perform well compared to their cost. As far as the reformation goes, this matte primer does what many others fail to do - absorbs excess oil and shine WITHOUT completely stripping away all moisture in the area. This creates a smoother, longer lasting makeup application. Additionally, this primer works on its own on top of sunscreen. Great job Smashbox! This is a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free for testing purposes from Influenster all opinions are my own . I do like how light weight this primer feels compared to others I‚Äôve tried. I tried this primer a few times with different foundations (charlotte Tilbury and Est√©e Lauder) And do Love how mattifying it is especially since I have an oily tzone . If you are looking for a primer that is lightweight and helps with oil control this is it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does a good job and mattifying the skin. With wearing masks, my forehead is always my main concern as my naturally oily skin draws attention. I‚Äôve been using this with no foundation over and it does the job. Added bonus that it contain salicylic acid for problem skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mattifying primer is the best for a matte look. It leaves ma skin smooth and it does blur imperfections. I love it and the results. I thank Influenster and Smashbox Cosmetics for sending this amazing primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this primer complimentary for testing purposes from Influenster but my opinions are my own. I have worn it a total of 3 times so far and I like it. I like the way it feels on my skin. I like the way my makeup blends with it. Now I have oily to combination skin & i think it could do a better job at controlling the oils. It did control it a little but not to the extent that i expected i guess. But I still recommend you give it a try for yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful at giving you a matte finish and controlling oil throughout the day! Wears very thin and dries quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer! It is so smooth and leaves such a silky, lightweight texture on my skin. It did seem to mattify but didn‚Äôt leave it looking dull. I think makeup wears beautifully over it. I think it minimizes pores but it‚Äôs not complete magic. Overall, I‚Äôd definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVED this product. It kept my normally oily face looking amazing. It was easy to put on and made my skin feel so soft.   The only reason it is 3 stars is because the smell gets to me. It has a very chemically smell (that eventually goes away) but its enough to take away from the product. I put this into the my regular routine but only use it when I want to look flawless.   I recieved this product for free via ipsy in the vox box.
